name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Px to Rem to Px Converter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A very simple pixel unit to rem unit (and back again) converter - just copy, paste, done.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A pixel unit to rem unit to pixel unit converter without any unnecessary clicking, just paste the value you have in your clipboard and you'll get an instant conversion to px or rem.

Then, simply click the copy button to grab your conversion.
